document.full_text: yemeni president ali abdullah saleh refused to sign a deal to step down on sunday, the third time such an agreement has fallen through at the last minute, despite pressure from gulf arab and western mediators.
document.title: saleh refuses to sign yemen deal despite pressure
lines_and_colors: yemeni president ali abdullah saleh refused to sign a deal to step down on sunday, the third time such an agreement has fallen through at the last minute, despite pressure from gulf arab and western mediators.
